text:
I held onto this thread so that I would have it when it was time to update our
server build VM templates because I figured I would need it. 
Dealing with the secure boot vulnerability mitigations were improved greatly in
the July CU, so that much has thankfully changed. But here it is a half year
later and our MS volume license site does not have a Windows 2019 install ISO
that is any newer than 11/2022. 
The fix definitely does what it's supposed to do - I can boot off a Windows 2022
ISO updated 10/2023, but not off the Windows 2019 ISO.

metadata.topic: Re: This is a "digest this - this is not going to be fun" patch
metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] Re: This is a "digest this - this is not going to be fun" patch

On Thu, May 11, 2023 at 8:19 AM Brian Illner <Brian.Illner@canal-ins.com
